thread.section_title: Greenvelope.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greenvelope.com | greenvelope.com
thread.title: CHARLENE SCOTT

author: CHARLENE SCOTT
title: CHARLENE SCOTT
text: I really like green envelope and the cool animations and designs. I definitely prefer it over evite.com. Lots more options. The reason I gave it 4 stars over 5 is that for my use, I sent Save the Dates and soon I will send the official invites and my guest list is over 10 people so I had to pay 9 dollars to upgrade. Which means when I send out the invites I have to pay another $9 to upgrade since my guest list is over the trial amount and same with the thank you cards. So that's $27 for me needing to send it to a few more people over the trial amount. Just wish that piece was a little cheaper.
